===============================
Change log for gocept.loginuser
===============================

1.1 (2015-02-09)
================

- Allow for the password hash to specify the hashing algorithm inline (made
  sha256 available so far).


1.0.1 (2015-01-07)
==================

- Fixed brown-bag release.


1.0 (2015-01-07)
================

initial release
